articles.description: The manner in which financial-rule breaches are dealt with "makes a mockery of the Premier League", says Luton midfielder Andros Townsend.

articles.description: The furthest inside the ropes, the closest to the stars - a caddie's role extends far beyond carrying bags and wiping clubs.

articles.description: Uefa is considering increasing squad sizes for this summer's European Championships to 26 players following talks with coaches.

articles.description: Vinicius Jr has overcome the odds to reach the top, but nothing could have prepared him for what he would face in Spain.
